title: One-Handed Basket Weaving: Poems on the Theme of Work
description: The poetry of the medieval Persian sage Rumi combines lyrical beauty with spiritual profundity, a sense of rapture, and acute awareness of human suffering in ways that speak directly to contemporary audiences. author: Jalal ad-Din Muhammad ar-Rumi
